snippet: The attack, which Israel did not acknowledge, threatened to rekindle longstanding tensions between Israel and Hezbollah.
abstract: Israeli helicopter fires on Hezbollah fighters in Syria, killing at least five of them; episode could reignite dormant hostilities between Israel and the Lebanese Shiite militant group.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Anne Barnard reported from Beirut, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem. Mohammad Ghannam and Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: The attack, which Israel did not acknowledge, threatened to rekindle longstanding tensions between Israel and Hezbollah.

headline.main: Hezbollah Says Israeli Helicopter Strike Killed Five Fighters in Syria
headline.print_headline: Hezbollah Says Israeli Helicopter Strike Killed Five Fighters in Syria
